resources.string: Prevention is always Better than Cure
\u25CF apisetu.gov.in to show Available Vaccine Centers.
Add years to your Life and Life to your Years just by Embracing Yoga in your Life.

When a new pathogen or disease enters our body, it introduces a new antigen. \nFor every new antigen, our body needs to build a specific antibody that can grab onto the antigen and defeat the pathogen.

\u25CF COVID-19 vaccines are safe, including for children ages 5 through 11 years. \n\u25CF COVID 19-vaccines are effective and can reduce the risk of getting and spreading the virus that causes COVID-19. \n\u25CF Vaccines are highly effective at preventing hospitalization and deaths.
Vaccines are effective at preventing against severe disease, including known variants currently circulating (e.g. Delta variant)
